meanings.definition: A person holding public office or having official duties.
meanings.sent1: The city officials met to discuss the new park project.
meanings.sent2: The government officials worked together to create new laws.
meanings.sent3: The officials had a picnic in the park to discuss serious matters.
meanings.sent4: The officials were like busy bees, buzzing around to get things done.
meanings.sent5: The officials wore suits and ties, looking very important and busy.

meanings.definition: A person who holds a position of authority in an organization or government.
meanings.sent1: The school officials organized the annual talent show.
meanings.sent2: The company officials made decisions about the budget.
meanings.sent3: The officials had a dance-off to determine the best leader.
meanings.sent4: The officials were the captains of their respective ships, guiding their teams.
meanings.sent5: The officials carried themselves with confidence and authority in the meeting.
